sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Closes out a queue item. Note that the completion time divisor should be provided in the event that this is a bulk operation (i.e. many queue operations were completed simultaneously)
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: QUEUE_BeginItemProcessing
